overview: Bruce has an extensive career in product development. Prior to Teres Bruce was the Director of Managed Services for Trilogy. While at Trilogy Bruce was responsible for managing large enterprise software projects. Bruce ensured successful projects by continuous focus on customer success based on delivering customer based business value. Bruce managed the merger and acquisition of pcOrder.com and then later ran the operations group of pcOrder. Prior to joining Trilogy Bruce ran a successful consulting practice, Integrated Legacy Systems, based in Austin, Texas. ILS focused on connecting companyâ€™s legacy code and applications to current technology solutions. Some of ILS clients included Landmark Graphics, Agrilogic, Inc. and Virtual Shopping, Inc. Before starting ILS Bruce was the Vice President of Development and Operations for Travelogix.
